item.title: Resources for Combining Expert Opinions
item.description: Methods for combining expert opinions for use in the creation of probability distributions in risk analysis is a hot topic right now. At least as hot as any quantitative information risk topic can get. I thought it might be helpful to bang out a quick post with some links and notes on the topic. Here are a few resources where one might find answers or a starting point. Some are inclined to simply average the results of expert parameter elicitation.
